events.name: BrainHack - Transform Tomorrow
events.description:
â€‹BrainHack is your unique hands-on experience into the future of digital technology. 
Dive into the realms of Cybersecurity, Artificial Intelligence, Space Tech, Software Development, Robotics and many more.

KEY DATES:
- Jan 31 to Apr 25: Registration Date
- Early May to Early June: Training and/or qualifying rounds [for competitions only]
- Jun 11 to Jun  12: Physical Finale

ACTIVITIES
With three exciting areas â€“ COMPETE, LEARN and EXPERIENCE â€“ there is bound to be something for everyone.
Step up your game and compete to win cash prizes in one of the four domains. 
Learn, build your skills and explore new technologies at the various hands-on workshops.
Finally, experience the Tech Showcase, where you can immerse yourself in â€‹cutting-edge innovations and witness the future of technology in action.

Note: Registration is now open for COMPETE and LEARN activities. Students who successfully qualify for the physical finale will automatically have access to the EXPERIENCE activities.

https://go.gov.sg/dstabrainhack18
